summary: Adds 5 spells to the school of Illusion Magic.
descriptionHtml:
If you like it, please [b][color=green]Endorse.[/color][/b]

[u]Looking for feedback![/u]

The .esp has been renamed - Please Uninstall/Remove Invisisbility.esp

[b][color=#DB7900]Spell Tome: Shimmer[/color][/b]
Apprentice Level Invisibility Spell
Cost - 78 Mana
Duration: 8 seconds
Item Code: xx000d65

[b][color=#DB7900]Spell Tome: Mirage[/color][/b]
Adept Level Invisibility Spell
Cost - 156 Mana
Duration: 15 seconds
Item Code: xx000d67

[b][color=#DB7900]Spell Tome: Merchant[/color][/b]
Novice Level - Charm - +10 Speechcraft
Cost - 63 Mana
Duration: 5 minutes
Item Code: xx004347

[b][color=#DB7900]Spell Tome: Traveler[/color][/b]
Adept Level - Charm - +20 Speechcraft
Cost - 135 Mana
Duration: 5 minutes
Item Code: xx004349

[b][color=#DB7900]Spell Tome: Diplomat[/color][/b]
Expert Level - Charm - +30 Speechcraft
Cost - 211 Mana
Duration: 5 Minutes
Item Code: xx00434A

The spell tomes can be found on leveled lists of their appropriate vendors.

[ Thanks ]
This mod was inspired by Lautreamont\'s \"More invisibility spells\" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1355

[ Contributors ]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/855171]Kozza[/url] - for the Charm Spell Idea
author: Malvenom

files.name: Illusion Redux
files.changelogHtml: 3 New Spells - Charm : Merchant / Traveler / Diplomat (+10 / +20 / +30 Speechcraft)
